commitResults.messageTitle: Add Increment: Level 0 - Greet
commitResults.messageBody: A skeletal version of the Duke that simply greets the user and exits.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ability to echo user commands
commitResults.messageBody:
A skeletal version of Duke that greets user, echos commands entered by
the user, and exits when the user types "bye".

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ability to store user text and display them
commitResults.messageBody:
Duke now has the ability to store text entered by the user and display
them when requested.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ability to mark tasks as done
commitResults.messageBody: Duke can now allow user to mark tasks as done.

commitResults.messageTitle: Tweak code to comply with coding standard better
commitResults.messageBody: Changes were made to the naming and use of boolean variable.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update code to include getters, setters, and class-level members
commitResults.messageBody:
Improvements are made to the code to include the use of getters,
setters and class-level members.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ability to differentiate tasks by type
commitResults.messageBody:
Duke now has the ability to track three types of tasks such as ToDos,
Deadlines, and Events.

commitResults.messageTitle: Change class name to suit coding standard better
commitResults.messageBody:
The name of the classes are changed to singular nouns to suit the
coding standard better, causing these files to be removed.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update code to improve the use of inheritance
commitResults.messageBody: The code is modified to improve the use of inheritance.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update Code to improve code quality
commitResults.messageBody: Some parts of the code are refactored to improve code quality.

commitResults.messageTitle: Revert "Update Code to improve code quality"
commitResults.messageBody: This reverts commit d8ba49c335275b3c58efb3d26d3243fd87a88bb1.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update code to improve code quality
commitResults.messageBody: Some parts of the code are refactored to improve code quality.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update code to semi-automate testing of Duke
commitResults.messageBody:
* Add script, testcase and expected outcome for automated testing
* Solve EOF error during automated testing

commitResults.messageTitle: Update code to improve Duke
commitResults.messageBody:
* Output messages by Duke are customized
* Check for unknown tasks not recognized by Duke

commitResults.messageTitle: Update code to improve code quality
commitResults.messageBody: Some parts of the code is refactored to improve code quality.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update code to improve code quality
commitResults.messageBody:
There are methods that may not be necessary and the code can be
simplified.

commitResults.messageTitle: Include the use of exceptions to handle errors
commitResults.messageBody: The code has implemented the use of exceptions to handle errors.

commitResults.messageTitle: Divide classes into packages
commitResults.messageBody:
The classes of code in Duke are now organized into suitable
java packages.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ability to delete tasks from list
commitResults.messageBody:
Duke now has the ability to delete tasks from the list as requested
by the user.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ability to save tasks to the hard disk
commitResults.messageBody:
Duke now has the ability to save the list of tasks in the hard disk
automatically whenever the list changes.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update Code to edit printed message
commitResults.messageBody: One of the print statement in printWelcomeMessage() is modified.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update code to load tasks from file
commitResults.messageBody:
The code is modified to load and read existing tasks from file,
in addition to saving tasks to file when changed. This change is due
to misunderstanding the requirement of the increment.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update code to improve code quality
commitResults.messageBody: Variables in the code are modified to make code better.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor code to extract closely related code as classes
commitResults.messageBody: Ui, Storage, Parser, and TaskList classes are added.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update code to have user command as individual classes
commitResults.messageBody: The user commands are extracted into individual classes.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update code to remove duplicate code
commitResults.messageBody:
Some parts of the code are duplicated or redundant and are
modified accordingly.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ability to understand dates
commitResults.messageBody: Duke now has the ability to read date inputs.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ability to find a task
commitResults.messageBody:
Duke is able to allow users to find a task by searching for
a keyword.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JavaDoc comments
commitResults.messageBody: JavaDoc comments are added to the code.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update FindCommand with JavaDoc comments
commitResults.messageBody: JavaDoc comments are added to the FindCommand class.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update code to understand both dates and time
commitResults.messageBody:
Duke now can print different formats of dates and time when
required.

commitResults.messageTitle: Modify docs\README.md
commitResults.messageBody: The README.md file in the docs folder is modified as a User Guide.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update docs/README.md
commitResults.messageBody:
Corrected a typo for the releases url and added expected outcome
for welcome screen.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update /docs/README.md
commitResults.messageBody: Code is modified to fit the theme better.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update docs/README.md
commitResults.messageBody:
Edit code due to minor error in heading.
Added new line to docs/_config.yml for standardization.
